sentences.en: A sinister inhuman scream rang out across the moors.
sentences.cn: 沼泽地里突然响起不像是人的不祥的尖叫声.

sentences.en: As far as wild animals and plants on the edge of extinction goes, we may not entirely believe in a reprieve but it would be inhuman of us not to try for one.
sentences.cn: 在野生动植物走向灭绝的今天，我们可能不会完全相信暂时的解救措施，但是如果我们不进行尝试的话，那就是不人道。

sentences.en: His self-control, reserve and aloofness were almost inhuman.
sentences.cn: 他自制、矜持和冷漠得几乎有些不近人情。

sentences.en: I wander about the dread nocturnal countryside of this inhuman season.
sentences.cn: 在这无情的季节里,在这可怕的夜间,我在乡野徘徊.

sentences.en: She turned to a life of exhausting, alomost inhuman labor.
sentences.cn: 她所选择的是一条从事令人精疲力竭, 几乎是残酷的劳动的生活道路.

sentences.en: She was doing an absolutely wild, inhuman, senseless thing.
sentences.cn: 她在做极端疯狂的 、 不人道的 、 愚蠢的事情.

sentences.en: Success was due to his inhuman efforts.
sentences.cn: 成功归功于他超人的努力.

sentences.en: The barbaric slaughter of whales is unnecessary and inhuman.
sentences.cn: 对鲸的野蛮屠杀既不必要也不人道。

sentences.en: The detainees are often held in cruel and inhuman conditions.
sentences.cn: 被拘留者的关押环境常常恶劣严酷、很不人道。

sentences.en: the inhuman and degrading treatment of prisoners
sentences.cn: 犯人所受的不人道和侮辱性待遇

sentences.en: The inhuman treatment of mental patients shocked the public.
sentences.cn: 残酷虐待精神病人的行为使公众震惊.

sentences.en: The refugees had suffered degrading and inhuman treatment.
sentences.cn: 难民遭受了侮辱性和非人的待遇。

sentences.en: The soldiers were ordered by their inhuman officers to bayonet every man they could find.
sentences.cn: 毫无人性的军官们命令士兵见人就刺。

sentences.en: They were guilty of the most barbarous and inhuman atrocities.
sentences.cn: 他们犯有最野蛮、最灭绝人性的残暴罪行.

sentences.en: We must unite the workers in fighting against inhuman conditions.
sentences.cn: 我们必须使工人们团结起来反对那些难以忍受的工作条件.

sentences.en: We regard many of these practices as cruel and inhuman.
sentences.cn: 我们认为这些措施中有很多是残忍和野蛮的.

trans.tran_cn: 非人的，不近人情的，残忍的，野蛮的，无人性的，不人道
trans.tran_en: very cruel or without any normal feelings of pity
